name: Vorpal Sword
description: When you attack a creature with this magic sword and roll a 20 on the attack roll, the target is decapitated if it has a head and can be killed by such means.

name: Holy Avenger
description: This radiant blade deals extra damage to fiends and undead. While you hold the drawn sword, it creates an aura of protection.

name: Staff of Power
description: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff and grants a +2 bonus to AC, saving throws, and spell attack rolls.

name: Cloak of Invisibility
description: While wearing this cloak, you can pull its hood over your head to become invisible. Anything you are wearing or carrying is invisible with you.

name: Flame Tongue Longsword
description: When you speak this sword's command word, flames erupt from the blade, shedding bright light in a 40-foot radius.

name: Amulet of Health
description: Your Constitution score is 19 while you wear this amulet. It has no effect if your Constitution is already 19 or higher.

name: Ioun Stone (Protection)
description: This dusty rose prism orbits your head and grants a +1 bonus to AC.

name: Ring of Protection
description: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while wearing this ring.

name: Dagger of Venom
description: You can use an action to cause poison to coat the blade. The poison remains until a hit deals an extra 2d10 poison damage.

name: Potion of Invisibility
description: When you drink this potion, you become invisible for 1 hour. The effect ends early if you attack or cast a spell.

name: Wand of Magic Missiles
description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can expend charges to cast magic missile.

name: Helm of Telepathy
description: While wearing this helm, you can cast detect thoughts (save DC 13) and communicate telepathically with any creature within 30 feet.

name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
description: Your Strength score is 19 while you wear these gauntlets. They have no effect if your Strength is already 19 or higher.

name: Cloak of Protection
description: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while you wear this cloak.

name: Cloak of Elvenkind
description: While you wear this cloak with its hood up, Wisdom (Perception) checks made to see you have disadvantage.

name: Bag of Holding
description: This bag has an interior space considerably larger than its outside dimensions. The bag can hold up to 500 pounds, not exceeding a volume of 64 cubic feet.

name: Greatsword +1
description: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

name: Decanter of Endless Water
description: This stoppered flask produces fresh or salt water on command. Different command words produce different amounts.

name: Bracers of Archery
description: While wearing these bracers, you have proficiency with the longbow and shortbow, and gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls.

name: Longbow +1
description: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

name: Battleaxe +1
description: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

name: Studded Leather +1
description: You have a +1 bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

name: Rapier +1
description: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

name: Boots of Elvenkind
description: While you wear these boots, your steps make no sound. You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks that rely on moving silently.

name: Lantern of Revealing
description: This hooded lantern burns for 6 hours on 1 pint of oil. Invisible creatures and objects are visible in its bright light.

name: Goggles of Night
description: While wearing these dark lenses, you have darkvision out to a range of 60 feet.

name: Chain Shirt +1
description: You have a +1 bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

name: Shortsword +1
description: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

name: Shield +1
description: While holding this shield, you have a +1 bonus to AC in addition to the shield's normal bonus.

name: Rope of Climbing
description: This 60-foot silk rope can be commanded to move and fasten itself securely. It can hold up to 3,000 pounds.

name: Potion of Greater Healing
description: You regain 4d4+4 hit points when you drink this potion.

name: Potion of Healing
description: You regain 2d4+2 hit points when you drink this potion.

name: Ball Bearings (Bag of 1000)
description: As an action, you can spill these tiny metal balls to cover a 10-foot square area. Creatures moving through must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity save or fall prone.
